casebody.data:
IN RE the Termination of the Parent-Child Relationship of: B.M., R.M., and K.M., Jr. (Minor Children)
and
T.M. (Mother) and K.M., Sr. (Father), Appellant-Respondent,
v.
The Indiana Department of Child Services, Appellee-Petitioner. Court of Appeals Case No. 18A-JT-1503 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED January 11, 2019

Unpublished Memorandum Decision

Affirmed.
